about_the_game:
Echoes of Mora brings the fantasy of diving into a mysterious underwater world to life. Swim through a flooded, abandoned village, find hidden objects, and uncover secrets in this atmospheric narrative adventure. Whether you choose VR or non-VR mode, join young Mora in her quest to find her missing brother across the boundaries of time.

ECHOES OF THE PAST

Search for clues about the village's story, solve puzzles, and unlock Echoes to glimpse the events before the flood. Inside these time portals, you can experience the beauty of the village prior to the tragedy, listen to the villagers' conversations, and communicate with Mora.

HELP MORA ON HER QUEST

As you uncover the past, you will learn more about Mora’s journey.
Following her brother's disappearance near a cursed violet lake, Mora takes it upon herself to rescue him. Soon after, the sudden rise of the lake's water level begins to threaten the village community. Mora won't be able to find her brother without your help. Share your clues and insights with her, decide where she should go next, and accompany her on her journey - and you may even avert the flooding before it's too late.

SWIM IN VIRTUAL REALITY

Play in VR mode to fully immerse yourself in the rich world of Echoes of Mora. Move your arms to smoothly navigate the sunken landscape. The game uses motion-tracking to detect your swimming movements and offers a wide range of intriguing interactions with the environment.

FEATURES

  • Switch easily between VR & non-VR mode within the same play session
  • Use immersive swimming mechanics in VR
  • Discover & explore different areas, each with its own atmosphere & challenges
  • Solve environmental & interactive puzzles
  • Unlock mysterious Echoes to travel through time & catch glimpses of the past
  • Experience a multifaceted story told in episodes
  • Interact with Mora & shape her journey
  • Collect clues to unravel the villagers' secrets & piece together the story behind the flood

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: Steam VR and Meta Quest Link (tested with Meta Quest 2, HTC Vive)
  • Additional Notes: Game installed on SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
